vote.text: Amendment SA 4010 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4010 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S6033; text: CR S6033) To amend the title.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4010 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
